cross.tools
Class ImageTools

java.lang.Object
  cross.tools.ImageTools

public class ImageTools
extends java.lang.Object

Utility class concerned with creation and saving of images.

Author:
Nils.Hoffmann@cebitec.uni-bielefeld.de

Method Detail

addPeakAreaToImage

public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage addPeakAreaToImage(java.awt.image.BufferedImage img,
                                                              java.util.List<PeakArea2D> snakes,
                                                              int[] seedPointColor,
                                                              int[] regionColor,
                                                              int[] boundaryColor,
                                                              int scansPerModulation)
Adds all snakes to an image. If one of the colors are null, this component wont be drawn.

Parameters:
img - img
snakes - snakes
seedPointColor - color of the seed point
regionColor - color of the peak area
boundaryColor - color of the boundary
scansPerModulation - scans per modulation
Returns:
new image

create2DImage

public static <T> java.awt.image.BufferedImage create2DImage(java.lang.String ffName,
                                                             java.util.List<Array> intensity,
                                                             int scansPerModulation,
                                                             double fillValue,
                                                             double threshold,
                                                             int[][] colorRamp,
                                                             java.lang.Class<T> creator)
Creates an image of an 2D chromatogramm.

Type Parameters:
T - should extend AFragmentCommand
Parameters:
ffName - file fragment name
intensity - intensity array
scansPerModulation - scans per modulation
fillValue - fill value
threshold - threshold
colorRamp - color ramp
creator - creator of this image
Returns:
image
